entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: updates #59645
  • Blazor: Minify CSS Isolation output #59644

Closed

  • ANCM restarts on any applicationHost.config change #36870
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Apply HeadersLengthLimit to preamble in MultipartReader #59646
    feature-http-abstractions, area-networking
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `79219e2` to `7d76a23` #59642
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Adds the ability to specify an appsettings file for user-jwts #58605
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • perf: improve ManagedAuthenticatedEncryptor Decrypt() and Encrypt() flow #59424
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/9.0] Skip tests on internal queues too #59578
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Skip tests on internal queues too #59579
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • perf: get rid of MemoryStream in `KeyRingBasedDataProtector` #59322
    area-dataprotection, Perf, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add AuthN/AuthZ metrics #59557
    pending-ci-rerun, area-security
